query: SELECT id, fromNumber, LEFT(messageBody, 60) as message, DATE_FORMAT(receivedAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as received_time, `read` FROM customerMessages ORDER BY receivedAt DESC LIMIT 20
